sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.real_name, student.gender, class.grade_year, class.class_name, major.major_name, attendance.status AS attendance_status, attendance.attend_date FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id JOIN attendance ON student.id = attendance.student_id WHERE student.status = '在读' AND attendance.status IN ('缺勤', '旷课', '迟到', '早退') AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0 AND attendance.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.real_name AS 姓名, base.gender AS 性别, base.grade_year AS 年级, base.class_name AS 班级, base.major_name AS 专业全称, CONCAT('近期缺勤：', GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(base.attendance_status, '于', DATE_FORMAT(base.attend_date, '%Y年%m月%d日')) SEPARATOR '；')) AS 近期缺勤详情, '学业预警等级：高' AS 学业预警等级, '原因说明：存在多次缺勤行为，需重点关注' AS 原因说明 FROM base GROUP BY base.real_name, base.gender, base.grade_year, base.class_name, base.major_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“学籍状态（在读/休学/毕业等）”及业务语义，“需要重点关注的学生”隐含其学籍状态为有效在读，故映射至 student.status = '在读'；同时结合 attendance.status 过滤缺勤类行为共同界定关注对象

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.real_name, student.gender, class.grade_year, class.class_name, major.major_name, attendance.status AS attendance_status, attendance.attend_date FROM student JOIN class ON student.class_id = class.id JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id JOIN attendance ON student.id = attendance.student_id WHERE student.status = '在读' AND attendance.status IN ('缺勤', '旷课', '迟到', '早退') AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND class.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0 AND attendance.is_deleted = 0) SELECT base.real_name AS 姓名, base.gender AS 性别, base.grade_year AS 年级, base.class_name AS 班级, base.major_name AS 专业全称, CONCAT('近期缺勤：', GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(base.attendance_status, '于', DATE_FORMAT(base.attend_date, '%Y年%m月%d日')) SEPARATOR '；')) AS 近期缺勤详情, '学业预警等级：高' AS 学业预警等级, '原因说明：存在多次缺勤行为，需重点关注' AS 原因说明 FROM base GROUP BY base.real_name, base.gender, base.grade_year, base.class_name, base.major_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC LIMIT 10
